channel.title: I need help! Probably a nooby question :P
channel.description:
Hey, well i was just going through my server that i downloaded and..... its spawn place is the ge and i was thinking about making it to some random place i found while traveling through the server
so to add it all up i need help on how to change: 1.the spawn place that would be home and were new players spawn.
2. death respawn so when you die you respawn to the same place.
SOOOOOOOOO if you can help me it will be much apreciated thanks!

item.title: I need help! Probably a nooby question :P
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

check your Entity, Player, and possibly Location classes

Read full topic

item.source: I need help! Probably a nooby question :P

item.title: I need help! Probably a nooby question :P
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

I don’t know 508+ either, but maybe try Player.class, PlayerHandler.class or Login.class, or see if there’s a server configuration file.

If all fails, get the coordinates of the spawn and then search it in any files you may think contains it.

Read full topic
item.source: I need help! Probably a nooby question :P

item.title: I need help! Probably a nooby question :P
item.dc:creator: @Rickrolla Rickrolla
item.description:
@Rickrolla wrote:

Why not use a 317?
Like 50x more tutorials and more people like 317-474.
PS. IF you’re going to use a 317 or 474, i’d prefer a DELTA protocol.
It’s the easiest protocol, i’m coding for about a week and i now have a Perfect “O” server.

Good luck!

Read full topic
